nodes.text: Rescue Run is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures Battles game, written by Stephen Crane and published in Imperial Entanglements. It depicts a battle as a strike force of SpecForce Infiltrators attempts to find and rescue a Rebel operative from an Imperial field camp, where he is being held awaiting transport to an interrogation facility.
A strike force of SpecForce Infiltrators must find and rescue a Rebel operative from an Imperial field camp, where he is being held awaiting transport to an interrogation facility.
